verses.roman:
bhakti-upadeśa vinu tāṅra nāhi kārya
ataeva nāma haila 'advaita ācārya'

synonyms: bhakti-upadeśa—instruction of devotional service; vinu—without; tāṅra—His; nāhi—there is not; kārya—occupation; ataeva—therefore; nāma—the name; haila—became; advaita ācārya—the supreme teacher (ācārya) Advaita Prabhu.
translation: Since He has no other occupation than to teach devotional service, His name is Advaita Ācārya.
